front.title: RTP Payload Format for H.264 RCDO Video

abstract.t: This document describes an RTP Payload format for the Reduced- Complexity Decoding Operation (RCDO) for H.264 Baseline profile bitstreams, as specified in ITU-T Recommendation H.241. RCDO reduces the decoding cost and resource consumption of the video processing. The RCDO RTP Payload format is based on the H.264 RTP Payload format.
